news: NOTICE: Data is now fetched asynchronously.

root.label: ABOUT PROJECT
root.content:
PROJECT: DoMD-Toolkit
VERSION: 1.0.0

The Doraemon-ish toolkit for MD simulations.

[[IMG: https://www.domd.today/images/DoMD-logo.png | LOGO ]]
root._content:
[[IMG: https://www.domd.today/images/DoMD-logo.png | LOGO ]]

TESTING NEW IMAGE MODES:

1. Default (Left, Max 300px):
[[IMG: https://placehold.co/400x200/000000/33ff33/png?text=DEFAULT | Default Mode ]]

2. Wide Mode (Left, Max 600px):
[[IMG: https://placehold.co/700x250/000000/33ff33/png?text=WIDE+MODE | Wide Mode | wide ]]

3. Center Mode (Center, Max 300px):
[[IMG: https://placehold.co/400x200/000000/33ff33/png?text=CENTERED | Center Mode | center ]]

4. Wide + Center Mode:
[[IMG: https://placehold.co/700x250/000000/33ff33/png?text=WIDE+AND+CENTERED | Wide Center | wide | center ]]

[[CODE: chem.py]]
def run(): pass
[[ENDCODE]]

 Code and image Examples

items.label: Ming-Yang Li (Lead)
items.content: NAME: Ming-Yang Li ROLE: Lead [[IMG: https://www.domd.today/images/mingyang-li.jpg | PHOTO | small ]] BIO: Dynamics in coarse-grained molecular dynamics simulations. Email: limy1619 AT mails.jlu.edu.cn Publications:

items.label: Rui Shi (Lead)
items.content: NAME: Rui Shi ROLE: Archmage [[IMG: https://www.domd.today/images/ruishi.jpg | PHOTO | small ]] BIO: Fireball! Lightning Bolt! Turn you into gay! Email: Publications: 1. 1. Ji-Yuan Xing, Sheng Li, Rui Shi*, Zhong-Yuan Lu*，Fine-Tuning Gradient Copolymers with Diverse and Controlled Microstructure and Mechanical Properties via Monomer Sequence Distribution: An In Silico Study，Macromolecules, 2024, 57(1), 385–395., ma, 2025, 1,2. 2. 2. Mechanism of periodic field driven self-assembly process, The Journal of Chemical Physics, Duo Xu; Rui Shi*; Zhao-Yan Sun; Zhong-Yuan Lu*, ma, 2025, 3,4.

1. 1. Ji-Yuan Xing, Sheng Li, Rui Shi*, Zhong-Yuan Lu*，Fine-Tuning Gradient Copolymers with Diverse and Controlled Microstructure and Mechanical Properties via Monomer Sequence Distribution: An In Silico Study，Macromolecules, 2024, 57(1), 385–395., ma, 2025, 1,2. [[IMG: /images/ruishi.jpg | TOC | small ]] 2. 2. fdafdsa, ff, 2205, 3,4. [[IMG: /image/ruishi.jpg | TOC | small ]]
